name: Minor Massacre
description:
Minor Massacre is a boomer shooter inspired game where you kick your way through as many hordes of enemies as you can.

Designed and created in 2 weeks by:

- Matthijs

- Marc 

Voice acting by:

- Martijn

Controls

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump

LMB/E - Kicking

Escape - Settings menu/pause game
